item.title: Vance and AI Accelerationism
item.description: This morning, JD Vance gave this speech about AI at the AI Action Summit in Paris. I wanted to share this speech because it describes almost exactly how I feel about AI, stated in a more eloquently way than i could
item.content: This morning, JD Vance gave this speech about AI at the AI Action Summit in Paris. I wanted to share this speech because it describes almost exactly how I feel about AI, stated in a more eloquently way than i could
